content: peachy socks peachy adjective informal /ˈpiː tʃi/ very good nifty dandy swell smashing unabashed perfection the alignment of many coincidentally wonderful events that moment when a knitter s wool choice appears destined for a pattern peachy socks by debbie ford page 1 materials notions yarn stitch markers a tapestry needle and a cable needle optional 1 skein/ 100 grams/ 425 m / 465 yards of fingering weight yarn sizes sample was knit using loom hand dyed yarns small medium large twist sock 80/ 20 sw merino / nylon sock finished sock circumference unstretched base white peach colourway 18 20 5 23 cm / 7 8 9 inches i would recommend picking a size that gives needles you 1 25 cm to 2 5 cm / 0 5 to 1 inch of negative ease 2 25 mm / us 1 circular needle 80 cm /32 inch model is wearing a medium size with a foot for magic loop or 2 25 mm / us 1 set of dpn s circumference of 22 cm / 8 5 inches or size needed to get gauge leg length worked in sample is 18 cm / 7 inches leg and foot length are fully gauge adjustable 32 sts and 46 row per 10 cm / 4 inches over unstretched lace pattern and stockinette instructions repeat round 2 until you have completed all cuff 8 row of the peachy pattern both socks are worked the same continue working in established pattern completing the peachy pattern 8 times 64 cast on 56 64 72 sts join in the round rounds in total being careful not to twist your stitches and place a bor marker heel flap round 1 p1 k2 p1 repeat to end of round turn your work so the ws is facing you we repeat round 1 14 more times 15 rounds in are now going to be working back and forth total on the next 28 32 36 sts the remaining 28 32 36 sts are the front of the sock and will leg be left unworked for now the pattern is worked on the front of the sock row 1 ws sl1 p 27 31 35 only the back of the sock is worked in plain row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 28 32 36 stockinette charted and written instructions sts are on page 4 repeat row 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times round 1 k 0 2 4 work row 1 of peachy 14 16 18 in total pattern k 0 2 4 k to end then work row 1 once more round 2 k 0 2 4 work next row of peachy pattern k 0 2 4 k to end heel turn row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn peachy socks by debbie ford page 2 row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn pattern on your last round pm after the first 28 32 36 sts row 3 rs sl1 k to 1
